name: Police Cars Parking
description:
Have you ever been fined for wrong parking? Probably it’s been because you didn’t play Shopping Mall Parking so you didn’t learn to park. Now you’ve got a second chance, walking in the shoes of the ones that fined you: the police.

What will you choose? Will you stop being a parking lot asshole and finally learn how to park or will you laugh in cops’ faces, destroying their cars and parking lot?

Key features

Key features
2 game modes: play with on-screen buttons or by moving your smartphone.
No valet parking available.
Different car models, different behaviours.
Realistic physics: Accelerate, hit the brakes... or don't and flip over!
